level.heading: Supersession.
level.text: This chapter supersedes the rule of the common law known as the rule against perpetuities.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 19-901.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 9 of the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act. See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
